text.data-name: Know exactly what’s happening across your office from air quality and occupancy to temperature and security all tracked in real time by intelligent sensors, and accessible anytime through a powerful, unified dashboard - just a click away.
text.tspan: Know exactly what’s happening across your office
from air quality and occupancy to temperature and
security all tracked in real time by intelligent
sensors, and accessible anytime through a
powerful, unified dashboard - just a click away.

text.data-name: The Brain Behind Your Smart Office

Sentinel Smart Systems brings intelligent automation and real-time insights to your office environment. From detecting air quality and occupancy to optimizing energy and access control — our sensor network helps you create a safer, healthier, and more effi
text.tspan: Sentinel Smart Systems brings intelligent automation and
real-time insights to your office environment. From detecting
air quality and occupancy to optimizing energy and access
control — our sensor network helps you create a safer,
Trusted across corporate offices, co-working spaces, and

text.data-name: Instantly track occupancy, temperature, humidity, and motion across your workspace.
Sensors automatically adjust lighting and HVAC based on real-time usage patterns
Ensure a healthier workplace with continuous air quality and CO₂ level insights.
Smart sensors detect access events and help secure every entry point in your office.
View and manage all sensor data from a single, intuitive dashboard — anytime.
Receive real-time notifications and actionable insights for faster decision-making.
Install Smart Sensors in Your Office
Connect to the Dashboard & Mobile App
Get Alerts Insights for Better Decision Making

“We cut our energy usage by 37% within 2 months — thanks to Sentinel’s automated sensors and alerts.”
– Arjun M., Facility Manager at Vertex Corp
“Setup took less than a day, and we started getting actionable data immediately.” – Dinesh R., CTO, Skyline Logistics
Before Sentinel, air quality was a mystery. Now, it’s something we monitor and manage daily.” – Rahul M., Health & Safety Officer, Brightlabs Pvt. Ltd.
What stood out most was how fast we got results — better energy use and fewer manual checks within weeks.” – Kavita R., IT Manager, VisionTech Co-Work
“Sentinel gave us complete visibility into our facility — we’ve never felt more in control of our workspace.” – Priya S., Admin Head, Delta Spaces
“The air quality insights were a game-changer for our employees’ comfort and productivity.” – Sneha T., Operations Lead, Nova Co-Work
